block.p: Major League Baseball MLB--Overturned the three-game suspensions of RHP Terry Adams, RHP Darren Dreifort, RHP Eric Gagne, LHP Onan Masaoka, RHP Alan Mills, RHP Antonio Osuna, RHP Chan Ho Park, C Todd Hundley, 1B Eric Karros, OF Geronimo Berroa and OF Shawn Green, the eight-game suspension of Glenn Hoffman, coach, and, reduced the four-game suspension of RHP Mike Fetters to one game.

Major League Baseball MLB--Overturned the three-game suspensions of RHP Terry Adams, RHP Darren Dreifort, RHP Eric Gagne, LHP Onan Masaoka, RHP Alan Mills, RHP Antonio Osuna, RHP Chan Ho Park, C Todd Hundley, 1B Eric Karros, OF Geronimo Berroa and OF Shawn Green, the eight-game suspension of Glenn Hoffman, coach, and, reduced the four-game suspension of RHP Mike Fetters to one game.
National League CINCINNATI REDS--Optioned RHP Scott Winchester to Louisville of the International League. Activated RHP Pete Harnisch from the 15-day disabled list.
National Basketball Association PHILADELPHIA 76ERS--Exercised their option on G Aaron McKie.
National Football League ATLANTA FALCONS--Signed LB Jon Hesse. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Signed LB Chad Cascadden. Agreed to terms with RB Patrick Pass.

National Hockey League ANAHEIM MIGHTY DUCKS--Named Guy Charron assistant coach. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Signed D Lyle Odelein. NEW YORK RANGERS--Signed C Brandon Dietrich. TORONTO MAPLE LEAFS--Announced the retirement of LW Wendel Clark.
N.Y. OLYMPIC REGIONAL DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY--Named Jeffrey Potter director of corporate development.
Major League Soccer TAMPA BAY MUTINY--Announced the retirement of MF Caleb Porter.

COASTAL CAROLINA--Announced the resignation of Dave Blank, athletic director, to accept the same position at Drake. COLUMBIA--Named Al Langer associate director of athletics for external affairs. HOUSTON--Named Bill Solberg women's soccer coach. OCCIDENTAL--Named Dixon Farmer athletic director. REGIS--Named Jeff Duggan sports information director. SOUTH CAROLINA--Agreed to terms with Curtis Frye, track and field coach, on a five-year contract. TEXAS A&M--Named Tana Buckner equestrian coach. TEXAS-SAN ANTONIO--Named Sherman Corbett baseball coach. TULSA--Promoted men's assistant basketball coach John Phillips to men's associate head basketball coach. WAKE FOREST--Announced the resignation of Charlie Davis, assistant athletics director for student-athletic enhancement and community programs. WASHINGTON STATE--Named Jim Sterk athletic director.
